title: IndelErrorModel
description: JSON schema describing the indel error model used for small variants in Strelka

motifs.description: An array which is the collection of all motifs estimated from the model
motifs.comment: There shouldn't be any gaps between the min repeat count and max repeat count for a given repeat pattern size

items.description: This object describes the params for a given motif
items.comment: A given motif consists of a repeat pattern size and the repeat count

indelRate.description: The likelihood that a indel will occur

noisyLocusRate.description: The likelihood that we are in a noisy state

repeatCount.description: The repeat count for the given motif

repeatPatternSize.description: The repeat pattern size for the given motif

thetas.description: An array which is the collection of all thetas used in the model

repeatPatternSize.description: The repeat pattern size for the given motif
